net.oneandone.jasmin.model

Class Repository

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.oneandone.jasmin.model.Repository

  • public class Repository
extends Object
    A list of modules. Plus load functionality (including linking and reload file handling)

      • loadApplication

        public void loadApplication(Resolver resolver,
                   net.oneandone.sushi.fs.Node base,
                   net.oneandone.sushi.fs.Node descriptor)
                     throws IOException
        An application is not a classpath item because jasmin.xml is from WEB-INF, it's not a resource. I don't want to make it a resource (by moving WEB-INF/jasmin.xml to META-INF/jasmin.xml) because all other config files reside in WEB-INF, and webapps usually have no META-INF directory at all.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • loadLibrary

        public void loadLibrary(Resolver resolver,
               net.oneandone.sushi.fs.Node base,
               net.oneandone.sushi.fs.Node descriptor,
               net.oneandone.sushi.fs.Node properties)
                 throws IOException
        Core method for loading. A library is a module or an application
        Throws:
        IOException

      • link

        public List<net.oneandone.sushi.fs.Node> link()
        Call this after you've loaded all libraries
        Returns:
        reload files
